    , ( [ Code ( "" , [] , [] ) "-o"
        , Space

              , Space

              , Space
              , Str "and"
              , Space
              , Emph [ Str "FILE" ]
              , Space
              , Str "has"
              , Space

              , Space
              , Str "extension,"
              , SoftBreak
              , Str "then"
              , Space
              , Str "instead"
